html:
One Sentence Summary
ðŸ–‹
Find the answer to any of your social problems through The Science of People, and read How to Win Friends and Influence People.
Books
The Charisma Myth
Breaks down how anyone can become more Charismatic with the 4 main types of Charisma
The Charisma Myth
What if charisma could be taught? CLICK HERE TO ACCESS THE BOOK'S AUDIO FILES AND CHARISMA EXERCISES For the first time, science and technology have taken charisma apart, figured it out and turned it into an applied science: In controlled laboratory experiments, researchers could raise or lower people's level of charisma as if they were turning a dial.
http://foxcabane.com/book/
How to Win Friends and Influence People
The stories told in this book are mindset changing. Influenced Warren Buffet and Tim Ferriss
How to Win Friends and Influence People: The Best Summary
A brief, no fluff, summary of Dale Carnegie's How to Win Friends and Influence People. Techniques in Handling People Don't criticize, condemn or complain. Give honest and sincere appreciation. Arouse in the other person an eager want. Six ways to make people like you Become genuinely interested in other people.
https://fs.blog/2012/07/how-to-win-friends-and-influence-people/
Never Eat Alone
Advice on Building relationships
Never Eat Alone Summary - Four Minute Books
1-Sentence-Summary: Never Eat Alone is a modern classic, which explains the art of networking and gives you actionable advice on how you can harness the power of good relationships and become a good networker to build a career you love.
https://fourminutebooks.com/never-eat-alone-summary/
The Science Of People
If you want actionable social skills advice that is backed by science, the Science of People take the findings of academic studies and turn them into actionable advice in video, book, and article form.
Book
Captivate: The Science of Succeeding with People
Learn about body language, how to have interesting conversations, and understand others
Captivate: The Science of Succeeding with People | Vanessa Van Edwards
You need to know how people work. As a human behavior investigator, Vanessa Van Edwards studies the hidden forces that drive our behavior patterns in her lab-and she's cracked the code. In Captivate she shares a wealth of valuable shortcuts, systems and behavior hacks for taking charge of their interactions at work, at home, and in any social situation.
https://www.scienceofpeople.com/captivate/
Podcast
Interviews with Vanessa Van Edwards
Vanessa Van Edwards | Captivate - The Art of Charm Podcast Episode 610
Full show notes for this episode can be found here: https://theartofcharm.com/610/ This time around, behavioral investigator and body language expert Vanessa Van Edwards of Science of People gives us a glimpse into the science of popularity and practical exercises for maximizing our social attractiveness as detailed in her latest book, Captivate: The Science of Succeeding with People.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t5hFKjmWlA&list=PL6YdkEI-d5pRH2rBPiKCVo17-RoYLLNCI&index=9
Videos
How to Talk to Anyone with Ease and Confidence
You can talk to anyone, and I am going to tell you how! In this video, I am going to teach you a few conversation tricks and nonverbal tips that use both your communication and people skills to lead to amazing conversation and memorable first impressions. Want some good conversation starter topics?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMmnPpjtU7c
How to Stop Being Boring
Stop boring in it's tracks with these communication strategies, people skills and body language hacks! Do people often forget your name, or worse, that they've even met you? This is a terrible feeling and I say no more! When we fight dullness we become more memorable, attractive and likable.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1pT3xamrI1E
Be More Likeable Using these 5 Science Backed Strategies
Use these 5 science based tips to increase your likability and become more memorable. In this video, I am going to teach you how to become more likable so you can be more successful and influential. Want more details on how to supercharge your likability?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tah_2L9aIxE
Blog
10 Essential People Skills You Need to Succeed | Science of People
About Vanessa Van Edwards Lead Investigator, Science of People I'm the author of the national bestselling book Captivate, creator of People School, and behavioral investigator. I've always wanted to know how people work, and that's what Science of People is about. What drives our behavior? Why do people act the way they do?
https://www.scienceofpeople.com/people-skills/
Charisma: What Is It and How You Can Become More Charismatic
Is there science behind what gives charismatic people their edge? The answer: definitely yes. In this guide I will teach you the science behind highly charismatic people and how you can take concrete steps to developing your own charisma. What does it mean to be highly charismatic?
https://www.scienceofpeople.com/charisma/
Twitter
Vanessa Van Edwards (@vvanedwards) | Twitter
The latest Tweets from Vanessa Van Edwards (@vvanedwards). Lead Investigator @ Science Of People Author of Captivate | Speaker | #RecoveringAwkwardPerson | I study what makes people tick. Portland, OR
https://twitter.com/vvanedwards
Other Websites
Succeed Socially
A Modern more evidence-based take on How to Win Friends and Influence People. Recommended on 80000 hours
Succeed Socially.com | Free Social Skills Guide For Adults
SucceedSocially.com is a free social skills guide for adults and older teenagers. It's written by someone who had his own struggles with shyness and loneliness, and who has degrees in psychology and counseling.
https://www.succeedsocially.com/
Podcasts
Podcasts with 700+ episodes on topics related to social skills ranging from conversational skills to negotiation
Toolbox Episodes Archives * The Art of Charm
If you don't know what you want, then you'll never get it. Many of our long-time podcast listeners have requested one simple page for all of our toolbox episodes, and now you have it, right here, today! If you're a first-time visitor, this is a great place to start.
https://theartofcharm.com/category/toolbox-episodes/
Videos
Charisma On Command
Breaks down the skills of charismatic TV characters and celebrities
Charisma on Command
Want to be more charismatic and confident? We make videos to help you learn how to be more confident, how to make people laugh, how to be more likable - basically everything about exuding charisma. Relationships in life are everything, so we want to teach you to turn on your most confident, charismatic self in the moments that matter most.
https://www.youtube.com/user/charismaoncommand
Ramit Sethi
Commonly recommended course on Social Skills
Improve Your Social Skills in Under 30 Minutes, with Ramit Sethi
â–ºWhat if you could talk to anyone, anytime, using the power of body language to create an instant connection? Here's how: https://go.iwillteachyoutoberich.com/how-to-talk-to-anybody/?_pt=D&_psy=2019&_psm=02&utm_campaign=d-htta-201902&utm_content=d-htta-201902-salesyoutube1 Do you wish you could meet new people, hold meaningful conversations, and develop closer friendships...without all the anxiety and trial-and-error? Find out how in this exclusive how-to video.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1eOKwU0LLTE
Advice I've taken
To Be Interesting, Be Interested â†’ I implemented the ideas from How To Win Friends and Influence People when I was incredibly socially awkward, and the mindset shift it gave me got me through
Body Language is Importantâ†’ I use body language to change how I feel, inspired by Captivate. I can better analyze others body language to understand how they are feeling
Conversation Sparkers â†’ I hate small talk, so Inspired by the Science of People, I use their questions to make for better conversations.
Join Toastmasters! â†’ You get used to impromptu speaking, and get rid of your nerves while talking to 20+ supportive people
Related Resources
Improve your Public Speaking
